item.title: PMP Disciplined Agile Delivery
item.description:
PMP Disciplined Agile Delivery

DAD Lifecycle

Disciplined Agile Delivery (DAD), the portion of the Disciplined Agile (DA) toolkit that focuses on delivery

item.title: PMP Exam Prep Cheat Sheet 2024
item.description:
PMBOK & Agile practice guide & Process Group

According to PMI, the PMP (Project Management Professional) certificate exam includes content that spans the value delivery spectrum, including predictive, adaptive, and hybrid approaches. It is based on Exam Content Outline (ECO), revised every 4 or 5 years by PMI.

item.title: 關鍵熱搜
item.description:
台灣

1.超導體

全網瘋傳常溫常壓超導體，那究竟是什麼？是真的實現了嗎？公司名稱沾到，股價就瘋漲140％

item.title: PMP Quality Audit vs. Inspection
item.description:
專案品質稽核與檢驗

Audit （稽核）& Inspection（檢驗、檢查） 在中文翻譯與字義上稍有差異，在PMBOK裡有清楚的區分！

  • Quality audit is “a structured, independent process to determine if project activities comply with organizational and project policies,processes, and procedures.”*
